short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search selected text via context menu. You can choose 20+ popular search engine, also can customize the search engine url yourself.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Popular search engine includes google.com etc. are buildin support.

v1.1.1 fixed sometimes menu item disappear bug.
